rows.label: qst201008_msg0001
rows.name: Meleph-dono, I apologize...

rows.label: qst201008_msg0002
rows.name:
With the cooperation of the Hr√¶svelgr Mercenary
Group, we were able to defeat half of the enemy
forces and a person who seemed to be a Driver, but...

rows.label: qst201008_msg0003
rows.name:
We also lost most of our soldiers
and were forced to retreat.

rows.label: qst201008_msg0004
rows.name:
So Mikumari's Driver was
someone else after all.

rows.label: qst201008_msg0005
rows.name:
So when he was defeated, Mikumari
returned to her Core Crystal.

rows.label: qst201008_msg0006
rows.name: I apologize for not being of service...

rows.label: qst201008_msg0007
rows.name:
No, it is not the Security
Department's fault.

rows.label: qst201008_msg0008
rows.name:
My misjudgment of the enemy's strength
is the cause of this failure.

rows.label: qst201008_msg0009
rows.name:
It is frustrating, but I did not
anticipate that the opponent would
be such an organization...

rows.label: qst201008_msg0010
rows.name:
Well, you don't have to
be so down about it.

rows.label: qst201008_msg0011
rows.name:
Not everything about this
operation was a waste.

rows.label: qst201008_msg0012
rows.name:
We were able to defeat one
of the main culprits,
Mikumari, and her Driver.

rows.label: qst201008_msg0013
rows.name:
At least we were able to confirm the scale
and strength of the opponent... Indeed,
there is no need to be discouraged.

rows.label: qst201008_msg0014
rows.name:
But we can't just leave
them be, can we?

rows.label: qst201008_msg0015
rows.name:
You're right. I don't intend
to let it end like this.

rows.label: qst201008_msg0016
rows.name:
If we let the culprits run free,
the damage will only increase.

rows.label: qst201008_msg0017
rows.name:
Then, regarding the culprits, the Security
Department will continue to track them and
gather as much information as possible.

rows.label: qst201008_msg0018
rows.name:
Yes, we will also prepare to
be able to move at any time.

rows.label: qst201008_msg0019
rows.name: I'm counting on you.

rows.label: qst201008_msg0020
rows.name: Yes, ma'am!
